snippet: Samsung Electronics Co. said operating profit declined to a two-year low in the second quarter, hit by the strong local currency and slowing demand for smartphones in China....

headline.print_headline: Samsung Earnings Hit by Slowing China Sales
headline.main: Samsung Earnings Hit by Slowing China Sales

lead_paragraph: Samsung Electronics Co. said operating profit declined to a two-year low in the second quarter, hit by the strong local currency and slowing demand for smartphones in China.
